subject: Unable to login to the application
description: I'm getting an error message when trying to login to the application. It says 'Invalid credentials' even though I know my password is correct.

subject: Cannot login to the system
description: When I try to sign in, the system rejects my password and says 'Invalid credentials'. I've reset my password twice and still having the same issue.

subject: Login page not accepting credentials
description: I'm trying to login but keep getting 'Invalid credentials' error. I've double-checked my username and password multiple times.

subject: Authentication failure
description: I can't login to my account. The system says my credentials are invalid but I'm 100% sure they are correct. This started happening after the recent update.

subject: Login issues after update
description: Since the latest update, I've been unable to login. System gives 'Invalid credentials' error every time I try.

subject: Authentication problem - can't login
description: I'm experiencing issues trying to login to my account. The system keeps saying my credentials are invalid. I've tried on multiple browsers.

subject: Report generation is failing
description: When I try to generate the monthly sales report, the system shows an error message saying 'Data processing failed'. I need this report urgently.

subject: Can't export data to PDF
description: The PDF export feature is not working. When I click on 'Export to PDF', nothing happens. I've tried on different browsers but having the same issue.

subject: Data visualization not loading
description: The charts and graphs on the dashboard are not loading. I just see spinning icons but no data appears even after waiting for several minutes.

subject: Mobile app crashing on startup
description: After updating to the latest version, the mobile app crashes immediately upon startup. I've tried reinstalling but still having the same issue.

subject: App crashes when opening camera
description: When I try to use the camera feature in the app, it crashes immediately. This started happening after the recent update.

subject: App shuts down unexpectedly
description: The mobile application keeps crashing randomly. Sometimes it happens on startup, other times while using different features.

subject: Mobile app freezes on payment screen
description: When I try to make a payment through the app, it freezes at the payment confirmation screen. I have to force close the app and start over.

subject: App crashes during checkout
description: I was trying to complete my purchase but the app crashed right when I clicked the 'Pay now' button. This has happened three times today.

subject: SSO login not working with Google
description: I can't sign in using the 'Login with Google' option. It redirects me back to the login page without any error message.

subject: Unable to reset password
description: I requested a password reset but never received the email. I checked my spam folder and tried multiple times over the past hour.

subject: Data import function failing
description: When trying to import CSV data into the system, I'm getting a 'Format not supported' error even though I'm using the template provided by your support team.

subject: Excel report download corrupted
description: When I download reports in Excel format, the file appears to be corrupted. When I open it, Excel says the file format is invalid.

subject: Cannot generate PDF reports
description: The PDF report generator isn't working. When I select 'Generate PDF' I get an error saying 'PDF generation failed' with error code RP-4032.

subject: Report scheduler not running
description: I set up scheduled reports to run every Monday at 8am, but they haven't been generated for the past 3 weeks. The scheduling interface shows they're active.

subject: Getting timeout errors on reports
description: When I try to run large reports, I keep getting timeout errors. This didn't happen before the latest update.

subject: Billing information not updating
description: I updated my credit card information yesterday, but the system still shows my old card. I tried to update it again today with no success.

subject: New feature request: Dark mode
description: Could you please add dark mode to the application? It would be much easier on the eyes when working late at night.

subject: App draining battery quickly
description: Since the last update, the mobile app seems to be using a lot more battery. My phone gets hot and battery drains about 20% per hour with the app running.

subject: Performance issues with large datasets
description: When I load datasets larger than 10,000 rows, the application becomes extremely slow and sometimes unresponsive. This is a new issue in the latest version.

subject: Unable to download CSV exports
description: When I try to export my data as CSV, the download starts but then fails with a 'Network error'. I've tried on multiple networks with the same result.

subject: Reports showing incorrect date ranges
description: I set up a report for November 1-15, but the generated report shows data from October 15-31 instead. I've double-checked the settings multiple times.

subject: Error when exporting large datasets
description: I'm trying to export a dataset with approximately 50,000 rows, but I keep getting a 'Memory allocation error' message. Is there a size limit on exports?
